chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The ideas of this book is to describe the conventions and the so called Maven Way in doing things in relationship with Maven.

I'm trying not to dive to deep into configuration details of Maven cause they have been well documented already. Ok ok. I'm not telling the whole truth, cause in some areas I can't avoid that to transfer a better understanding of the why and why not.

If you are working with Maven and in particular in having problems and asking questions in forums or other popular areas like StackOverflow etc. you will often hear the phrase: Don't do it this way. You should go "The Maven Way."
But what exactly is "The Maven Way"?
